name: MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting
desc: The states that determine when language option changes take effect.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No language option change is to be made.

items.name: case nowPlayingItemOnly
items.desc: The language option change is applied to the now playing item only.

items.name: case permanent
items.desc: The language option change is applied to all future playback items.
